nodes.text: A male Vurk was a card player in the pub Winker's on the planet Verzan. He won against Chass na Chadic and he wanted her A/SF-01 B-wing starfighter as the prize. After Chadic refused to, he wanted to get it the hard way, but a stranger shot him with a stun.
The Vurk appeared in the 2020 novel Shadow Fall, written by Alexander Freed.
